content:
Given two sentences and a list of emotions, generate a third sentence which combine the two ideas together using one of the emotions in the list. 
He was always so calm. He would never raise his voice.
List of emotions: happy, sad, angry, anxious, confused, curious, jealous, proud.
Despite the chaos around him, he was always so calm and would never raise his voice, making everyone around him feel proud of his unwavering composure.
